posts.post_content:
I am putting this T200 Fatima Boston Amer. Team card up for sale.  Its actually a really nice card for the grade.  Features Smokey Joe Wood, Tris Speaker, and Harry Hooper.  Cool card with a clean back.  Paypal gift/payment owed preferred.  Email me at [url]rdamboise4@gmail.com[/url] if interested.

T200 Fatima Boston Americans PSA 1 $85 SOLD ***
